page.title: 06Tairmeibion Farm
page.content: Tairmeibion Farm is a modern and efficient farm business.Expansion is often necessary and this can be seen at Tairmeibion in the building of a new cattle parlour.However,in recent years conservation and the aesthetic (scenic) quality of the land has become of greater importance to people,thus greater emphasis has been put on the landscaping of farms to improve their scenic quality. Tairmeibion with its two large silos and its slurry tank lies in a very flat area,whereby,such structures stand out against the skyline.The owner of the Cochwillan Estate intends to plant a shelter belt of trees around the slurry tank and new cattle parlour in the near future.Thus in years to come it will improve the visual character of the farm.
